cntOnlineRes.linkage: Created and Maintained by the City-County Planning Department, Winston-Salem/Forsyth County, NC.

distorOrdPrc.resFees: Free download. Fee charged for custom requests.
distorOrdPrc.ordInstr: Standard Ordering Instructions: Data provided free for download. For custom requests, see the City of Winston-Salem web site at http://www.cityofws.org/Home/GIS/Articles/GISRequestForCustomData for current pricing and ordering information.; Technical Prerequisites: This data set may be viewed using any ESRI GIS or compatible software capable of reading ESRI shapefile format.
distorOrdPrc.ordTurn: 2 weeks, usually, depending upon staff availability.

onLineSrc.orDesc: This dataset is available for download in a zip file format produced in a Windows environment.

citRespParty.rpOrgName: Planning Department of Winston-Salem & Forsyth County
citRespParty.rpPosName: GIS/Principal Planner, Planning Information & Graphic Services

citRespParty.rpOrgName: Planning & Development Services, City of Winston-Salem/Forsyth County

cntOnlineRes.orDesc: Zoning Districts for Forsyth County, NC

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Wards is a polygon shapefile used to delineate wards in Winston-Salem. These ward lines became effective 11/21/2011 and are updated, typically due to annexations, as needed.
dataIdInfo.idPurp: This data set is a geographical digital representation of the wards (political boundary) in Winston-Salem. To be used pimarily by the users of the Winston-Salem & Forsyth County GIS system.

cntOnlineRes.linkage: Created and Maintained by the City-County Planning Department, Winston-Salem/Forsyth County, NC.

LegConsts.othConsts: Every effort has been made to insure that the information offered is correct and up-to-date. However, complete accuracy cannot be guaranteed. Requesters are responsible for understanding issues related to GIS digital data, mapping, and data accuracy. By downloading data, the user agrees to the following disclaimer: Disclaimer. The City of Winston-Salem and Forsyth County make no warranty, representation, or guarantee of any kind regarding any maps or other information provided herein or the sources of such maps or other information. The City of Winston-Salem and Forsyth County specifically disclaim all representations or warranties, express or implied, including, without limitation, the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. The City of Winston-Salem and Forsyth County assume no liability for any errors, omissions, or inaccuracies in the information provided regardless of the cause of such or for any decision made, action taken, or action not taken by the user in reliance upon any maps or information provided herein. The information cannot be construed to be a legal document. All information is proprietary and may not be sold or resold. No use for resale or commercial purposes, as defined in North Carolina General Statute Chapter 132-10, is permitted. Primary sources from which the information have been compiled must be consulted for verification of the information contained in this data. Such primary information sources may include, but are not limited to, the Forsyth County Assessor's Office and the Winston-Salem/Forsyth County Planning Department. The requester agrees to make payment as specified in the City of Winston-Salem and Forsyth County Data Distribution Policy and to abide by all other provisions of the Policy, as they may be revised from time to time.

Consts.useLimit: Access constraints: None. Use constraints: No sale, dispersion, or professional publication of this data is permitted without express permission of the City of Winston-Salem and Forsyth County. All information is proprietary. No use for resale or commercial purposes, as defined in North Carolina General Statute Chapter 132-10, is permitted.
